summary: A recently engaged woman's life is thrown into turmoil after confessing to her fiancé that she once experimented with bestiality.
cast: Melinda Page Hamilton|Bryce Johnson|Geoff Pierson|Colby French|Jack Plotnick|Bonita Friedericy|Brian Posehn|Morgan Murphy|Steve Agee|Lisa Salzano|Candiss Cogdill|Harvey J. Alperin|Ernest Misko|Rebecca Avery|Kira Burri|Heidi Miller|Ella Miller|Hooch|Misa Doi|Bobcat Goldthwait|Kat McPhee
title: Los perros dormidos mienten
